description: Returns the count, average, sum, minimum, maximum, sum of squares, variance, and standard deviation for the specified aggregated field. If the aggregation field is of type String, only the count statistic is returned. Requires permission to access the GetStatistics action.

parameters.name: queryString
parameters.description: The query used to search. You can specify '*' for the query string to get the count of all indexed things in your Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: statistics
nested_items.description: The statistics returned by the Fleet Indexing service based on the query and aggregation field.

nested_items.name: count
nested_items.description: The count of things that match the query string criteria and contain a valid aggregation field value.

nested_items.name: average
nested_items.description: The average of the aggregated field values.

nested_items.name: sum
nested_items.description: The sum of the aggregated field values.

nested_items.name: sumOfSquares
nested_items.description: The sum of the squares of the aggregated field values.

nested_items.name: variance
nested_items.description: The variance of the aggregated field values.

nested_items.name: stdDeviation
nested_items.description: The standard deviation of the aggregated field values.
